thread.title: Live: Trump preaches 'unity, strength' in Congress address
thread.title_full: Live: Trump preaches 'unity, strength' in Congress address

title: Live: Trump preaches 'unity, strength' in Congress address
text:
Donald Trump makes first address to Congress Updated March 01, 2017 13:31:59 
Donald Trump is giving his first address before a joint sitting of the US Congress. 
Follow our live blog for updates. First posted March 01, 2017 12:45:58 Top Stories 
If you have inside knowledge of a topic in the news, contact the ABC . News in your inbox 
With abs, an uncanny likeness to actress Alicia Silverstone and one million-plus followers on Instagram, Steph Smith has a life that glows on social media. Top Stories 
This service may include material from Agence France-Presse (AFP), APTN, Reuters, AAP, CNN and the BBC World Service which is copyright and cannot be reproduced. 
AEDT = Australian Eastern Daylight Savings Time which is 11 hours ahead of UTC (Greenwich Mean Time)
